title: The Shape of things
creator_credit: Marcel Martin, ONF | NFB and Jacques Giraldeau
brief_description: An international symposium on sculpture held in Montreal in the mountain park overlooking the city. Follows the work of eleven sculptor from nine countries as they chip, chisel and hammer. Shows their finished sculptures left in the park for the pleasure of passers-by.
creator_credit_for_label: Marcel Martin, ONF | NFB and Jacques Giraldeau
